originalText.text: I rarely ever write reviews if I do it’s I really loved the place I feel like more people should go or I really hate the place. The place was over booked! The doctor was late to his own officer and when they told him, that I made an early appointment because I need to do more stuff throughout the day. He didn’t care at all. All said he was “I came from Long Island “ such an unprofessional behavior more like cocky and arrogant. No respect for other peoples time.

originalText.text: Today I went to this place in 9am and wrote my name on the clipboard, NOW ITS 1PM, IVE BEEN WAITING FOR 4 F"IN HOURS AND THEY STILL DIDNT CHOSE US!!!!! 3/10 PLACE, VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.

text.text: Today I went to this place in 9am and wrote my name on the clipboard, NOW ITS 1PM, IVE BEEN WAITING FOR 4 F"IN HOURS AND THEY STILL DIDNT CHOSE US!!!!! 3/10 PLACE, VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.

originalText.text: The best dentist I’ve been to in a while!  I went in with a swollen molar because of my wisdom teeth, they were very gentle with me and did a quick referral to a dental surgeon office right away.  Dr. Evelyn was very patient and gentle when cleaning my teeth.  She spoke to me during the process and made me feel comfortable (I don’t feel comfortable with teeth business and I was in pain so it helped a lot) I went in at 8:30 and the dentists came in at 9:30. I got attended right away.  Left the place at around 10:40am.

originalText.text: I went to Smile on April with Dr. Nunez, I was charged $350 extra of consultation fee for a 3D panoramic I was referral to a endodontist the CD didn't  open I lost my time and $149.00 consultation fee, came to smile replace de CD and again didn't open they did not refund the money and I had to pay the other dentist for the 3D image again. Worst place ever. They gave me an attitude because I complaint, I lost the money and time and they were offended.  Unbelievable

originalText.text: The worst place n dentist ever they just think about how to make money with the patience doing root canal and crown when u don't need it  I see they changed management and now the services is slow. None of the old staff are there anymore .There's no dentist hygienist to clean your teeth so you have to wait for the dentist to be finished with the last patient who their working on. Everyone looks busy,  but my child sat in the chair for an hour just to get her teeth clean. The manager came too start the procedure,  but then walked out to never return. I will never go back there again.
